content.chorus:
All good gifis around us
Are sent from heaven above,
Then thank the Lord, o thank the Lord
For all His love.
verses:
We plow the fields, and scatter the good seed on land,
But it is fed and watered by God's almighty hand;
He sends the snow in winter, the warmth to swell grain,
The breezes and the 
sunshine, and soft refreshing

We thank Thee, then, o Father, for all things bright and good,
The seed time and the harvest, our life, our health, and food;
No gifts have we to offer, for all Thy love imparts
But that 
which Thou desirest, our humble, thankful hearts.
